Activity.Name: Image Click
Activity.ToolTip: Perform OpenCV template matching and click on the location that matches the template image.

Activity.Name: Image DoubleClick
Activity.ToolTip: Perform OpenCV template matching and double-click the location that matches the template image.

Activity.Name: Image RightClick
Activity.ToolTip: Perform OpenCV template matching, and right-click the location that matches the template image.

Activity.Name: Image Hover
Activity.ToolTip: Perform OpenCV template matching and move the mouse over the location that matches the template image.

Activity.Name: Image Wait
Activity.ToolTip: Perform OpenCV template matching and wait until the template image matches. No mouse operation.
